content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why was an agreement not reached?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] An agreement was not reached because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, felt the price I was willing to pay was too low for the apartment, which was 550 Euro per month. He believed the apartment's value should be reflected in a higher price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] An agreement was not reached, so there was no final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as 8. The conversation was respectful and professional.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
